caption.title: HPX8C is involved in the anti-Zika virus defense.
caption.p: Effect of RNAi mediated-HPX8C depletion on ZIKV infection in the mosquito 7 days PBM (mean ± SEM). Student’s t-tests were used to determine the significance of difference in expression between treated and control groups. *** p<0.001. Each treatment group comprised 30 mosquitoes.
